description: Kirk Cummings"Kick-Ass"Ht: 5'9" WT: 150lbs Season W/L record (0-1)Silas O'Hara"The Spartan"Ht: 5'9" WT: 150lbsSeason W/L record (0-0) Kirk "Kick-Ass" Cummings is back once again, this time, determined to win that first victory and fuck his opponent into submission. His only training is here on the NK mat, but Kick-Ass is a scrappy fighter and after losing his first match, he's making sure he doesn't wind up on the bottom again. New to the ranks is Kick-Ass' opponent Silas "The Spartan" O'Hara. The Spartan may not have classical training either, but he's rolled around with buddies back home and made sure to watch a few matches on the web for training. Kick-Ass promises he's going to make his opponent his bitch and have him worship his body before covering him in cum. The Spartan sees things a little differently, he plans on stringing his opponent up and using him as a punching bag before fucking his ass as he begs for mercy.
title: Kirk "Kick-Ass" Cummings vs Silas "The Spartan" O'Hara
